item.title: MBA Monterey
item.description: Issues after upgrade to MacOS Monterey Battery life went to shit, have to enable low power mode on battery. Bitwig and SoundCraft MTK 12 mixer no longer cooperate. Issue #1 I don’t have a whole lot of evidence to support but it did feel like the battery life on my brand new Macbook Air M1 had gotten a lot worse after the upgrade to Monterey (12.0.1). Previously I could use the laptop for several days without reaching for the charger, now it seems the battery percentage was dropping several percent every few minutes.
Archive of old Python tornado blog.
